text: Yesterday I wrote about Derrick Rose as a 32-year-old star athlete, and as if to prove my point, he was quoted in today's NY Post saying: “I’m 32 years old. I never talked shit like that in my whole life. I’m not going to start now once Clint Capela starts talking crazy. I’m too old for that shit, bro.” I love this guy. If any Knick could boast, it's DR, but he's cool. He likes playing for the Knicks, and we like him.
